operations.summary: Returns block and property level information about an address
operations.description: Given a valid house number, street and borough, this operation returns block and property level information about an address. Results will include X/Y coordinates, political, city service and property information as well as normalized street names and codes.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the desired content type of the returned data

parameters.name: houseNumber
parameters.description: The house number portion of the address

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: The street portion of the address

parameters.name: borough
parameters.description: The borough in which the address is located

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns property level information about a tax lot
operations.description: Given a valid borough, tax block number and tax lot number, this operation returns property level information.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the desired content type of the returned data

parameters.name: borough
parameters.description: The borough in which the tax lot is located

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: Tax block number

parameters.name: lot
parameters.description: Tax lot number

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns property level information about a building
operations.description: Given a valid building identification number (BIN), this operation returns property level information.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the desired content type of the returned data

parameters.name: bin
parameters.description: The building identification number (BIN) of a building on the desired lot

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns information about a segment defined by an on street between two cross-streets
operations.description: Given a valid street segment, defined by an on street between two cross-streets and borough, this operation returns segment level information about the left and right side blockfaces.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the desired content type of the returned data

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: onStreet
parameters.description: The street on which the segment is found

parameters.name: crossStreetOne
parameters.description: The first cross street

parameters.name: crossStreetTwo
parameters.description: The second cross street

parameters.name: borough
parameters.description: The borough in which the onStreet is located

parameters.name: boroughCrossStreetOne
parameters.description: The borough in which the crossStreetOne is located if it differs from the borough parameter

parameters.name: boroughCrossStreetTwo
parameters.description: The borough in which the crossStreetTwo is located if it differs from the borough parameter

parameters.name: compassDirection
parameters.description: Used when requesting information about only one side of the street

operations.summary: Returns information about a point defined by two cross streets
operations.description: Returns geographic information related to the intersection, including the names of any additional streets that are at the intersection, and the administrative and political district identifiers within which the intersection is located.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the desired content type of the returned data

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: crossStreetOne
parameters.description: The first cross street

parameters.name: crossStreetTwo
parameters.description: The second cross street

parameters.name: borough
parameters.description: The borough in which the intersection is located

parameters.name: boroughCrossStreetTwo
parameters.description: The borough in which the crossStreetTwo is located if it differs from the borough parameter

parameters.name: compassDirection
parameters.description: Required for streets that intersect more than once

operations.summary: Returns address information using a well-known place name as input
operations.description: This call returns the same information as the address call but allows the client to specify a well-known NYC place name instead on an address. For example, 'Empire State Building' or 'George Washington Bridge'. See the description of an address call for more detail.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the desired content type of the returned data

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A well-known New York City place name

parameters.name: borough
parameters.description: The borough in which the place is located

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key
